resources.string: 1) Respectful Content: Users are prohibited from sharing any sexually explicit or inappropriate content.
2) Message Etiquette: Avoid spamming or bombarding other users with unnecessary messages.
3) Business Promotion: Refrain from promoting personal or commercial businesses within the app.
Main Point: This app is designed for enjoyable and lighthearted interactions. Lets maintain a positive and fun atmosphere by adhering to these guidelines.
